website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for a single DIN car stereo with a touchscreen, this is your best option. It supports every audio format you can think of, and the platform is incredibly easy to use.
pros: The retractable and detachable touchscreen is big and beautiful
It has inputs for a rear backup camera and a front-facing USB
It supports Bluetooth, and it’s even got a CD player on board
cons: It’s pricey when compared to units without touchscreens

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Biggest waste of money I have ever spent. Terrible installation instructions and 4 wires needed that were not even in my factory harness. After finally getting it wired up, it works for a split second and then shuts back off. If I could have given zero stars I would have. $150 and you cant even use the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised ! This is a Nice Unit Dual Electronics XDVD156BT Multimedia Retractable & Detachable 7-inch. I installed it in my Motorhome. It works great especially for the Phone and My Sirius Radio plugged into AUX ....... Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money 100%
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth can be finicky but it does what it says and is worth the price tag. Had to relocate ac controls because I didnt realize it would have hit my dash but worked well
customer_reviews.author: Ian Milatz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed, pretty happy so far. Works well, touch screen is responsive. Will update if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Terry

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Chinese Junk
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to Installing it. The Bluetooth one call and the sound only worked for two days. Total Junk
customer_reviews.author: The Toymaker

customer_reviews.title: Waste of hard earned money!
customer_reviews.text: Unit is a complete waste of money. Only had in truck for 3 days and the Bluetooth stoped working. A day later no sound from speakers. But hey the subwoofers still work. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate advertising
customer_reviews.text: Stereo prouces good sound. It is easy to set up. The downside is that it does not support mp4 videos despite the advert claim that it does.
customer_reviews.author: TJK

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen didn't work from beginning
customer_reviews.text: The whole right side of screen doesn't respond to any touch it will barely recognize the right side. I can't even change the clock because the remote doesn't work either luckily it will play music from a aux cord but that's about it. I wanted to give them the benefit of the doubt but I guess some of the reviews were right it's a pile of junk right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Quality price good yes.
customer_reviews.text: Very good the price is. The product good. Quality yes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth h disimone

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Only issue I have is Bluetooth music and calls don't function properly. Freezes my headunit. I had to disable it in my settings
customer_reviews.author: BrutalBrad69

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He is fixing up an old Cadillac and had been eyeing this system for a while. He was so happy to receive it. The system was easy for him to install and the sound quality is amazing. I am buying another one for my car next.
customer_reviews.author: Zandria brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality radio no problems here
customer_reviews.text: Work great, sounds good, affordable and performs like original equipment
customer_reviews.author: big m

customer_reviews.title: Good for a month than stops working
customer_reviews.text: Product was great for the first month but after that the screen kept putting itself in and the whole system would turn off repeatedly
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bertolini

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does what you need it to but read the manual first. It's tricky to navigate and know the features. Great raido though
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T. Kummelman

customer_reviews.title: Overall good radio
customer_reviews.text: I wish that more than one phone can be connected at a time and the touch screen could be a little more responsive but overall good radio
customer_reviews.author: james flournoy

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Worked great STAY AWAY FROM AUDIOSAVINGS used the, twice had to send them both back just got this dual in the mail today and worked great !!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Raul celaya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as described. I have bought 2 of these and they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Sheila  Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A tone of features. Great for travel trailer. It interfaces with already installed AV. Follow directions as you go or go on line.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Dual stereo
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's definitely a good buy! Make sure you have a professional install it though
customer_reviews.author: Omar grissom

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Great but didnt come with the plastic cover to go around it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Used it in a Church Van with a flat screen TV.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Broxie

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEEDED ITEM
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY GOT MY REFUND SO EVERYTHING IS OK NOW THANK GOD
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, check out Yody 9.0 though
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I upgraded to YODY ANDROID 9.0 so I could run apps and screen mirror. Downside: no more dvds :( This product works great and DVD even plays while driving :)
customer_reviews.author: Sean O.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday. Initially he was quite happy with it. Sound was good. Picture was good. one year and 2 weeks later the screen stopped opening. 17 months in it has stopped working all together , except for the cd player . It no long communicates with the phone.. I am beyond pissed off.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Mistler

customer_reviews.title: Amazon stands behind there stuff.
customer_reviews.text: No matter what i need, i can find here at amazon. And i know i will work right.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Q ramsey

product_meta.title: Dual Electronics XDVD156BT Multimedia Retractable & Detachable 7-inch LED Backlit LCD Touchscreen Single DIN Car Stereo Receiver with Built-in Bluetooth, CD/DVD, USB, microSD Card & MP3 Player
product_meta.description: Style:Single DIN CD/DVD AV Bluetooth800 x 480 resolution touchscreen View-Angle adjustable Bluetooth hands-free calling & Audio streaming front & rear aux inputs 1a USB charge & playback port Micro SD card input a/V input rear camera input 50W x 4 2V RCA preamp outputs (front, rear &.
feature_bullets: Built-in Bluetooth wireless technology – your single DIN car stereo receiver will easily pair with the vast majority of Bluetooth devices allowing you to make and receive all your calls hands free

Music streaming – you will now be able to play music from apps such as Pandora, iHeartRadio and Spotify from your Apple, Android & media devices including any music stored by simply connecting wirelessly to your car stereo

7-Inch LED backlit LCD touchscreen high Resolution display – Your high resolution 7-inch touchscreen allows easy visibility, displays all relevant music or road information on the large screen and keeps all your favorite options within fingers reach

Cd/DVD, USB, MicroSD card, MP3 & WMA playback – listen to your favorite music; either by the CD player, front panel USB port which also charges your device, MicroSD card & MP3 players, am/FM radio receiver and enjoy all your favorite movies

System Installation connectors – Your single DIN car stereo unit generates 200 watts of peak power, has a RCA a/V input (rear), rear video camera input (RCA), 2 RCA video outputs (rear) & Front/rear/sub preamp outputs
1 year – high quality and reliability with hassle-free parts and labor with excellent customer service

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars136 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
